title: Senior Python Backend Engineer
description:

title: Backend Team Lead (Python)
description:
As a Backend Team Lead (Python), you will be responsible for leading and mentoring a dynamic team of developers. Your primary focus will be on architecting, designing, and implementing robust and scalable solutions using the project tech stack.

Key Responsibilities:

Technical Leadership: Provide technical leadership to the backend development team, ensuring the highest quality of code and adherence to best practices.

Architecture and Design: Architect and design scalable and efficient backend solutions using the project tech stack, including Python, MongoDB, FAST API framework, PostgreSQL, SqlAlchemy, Unit tests, and AWS.

Team Collaboration: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including frontend developers, product managers, and QA engineers, to deliver end-to-end solutions.

Code Review and Quality Assurance: Conduct regular code reviews to maintain code quality and enforce coding standards. Implement and oversee unit tests to ensure the reliability of the system.

Mentorship and Skill Development: Provide guidance and mentorship to team members, fostering a culture of continuous learning and skill development.

Scalability and Performance Optimization: Identify opportunities for system optimization, performance improvements, and scalability enhancements.

Documentation: Maintain comprehensive technical documentation for the backend systems, ensuring clarity and knowledge transfer within the team.

Requirements:

Minimum 8 years of experience in software development.
Proven experience as a team lead or in a leadership role.
Strong proficiency in Python and experience with relevant frameworks and libraries.
Expertise in MongoDB, FAST API framework, PostgreSQL, SqlAlchemy, Unit tests, and AWS.
Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to think critically.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
Ability to thrive in a fast-paced and collaborative environment.

Preferred Qualifications:

Experience with microservices architecture.
Familiarity with containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes).
Previous experience in a startup or fast-growing tech environment.

Benefits:
25 vacation days per year
10 sick leave days per year
Remote / Flexible working
Annual team retreats
Investment in learning & development

title: QA Automation Engineer
description:
We invite a Quality Assurance (QA) Automation Engineer with 2+ years of commercial experience in embedded software validation and test automation to join new PLVision‚Äôs project for one of the leaders in the networking industry. In this role, you will validate new DASH functionality for modern Data Processing Unit (DPU)/ Intelligence Processing Unit (IPU) systems and collaborate in open-source communities.

This is an opportunity to get a stable job in a reliable company that continues to hire and extend in Ukraine.

About PLVision
We are a software product development company specializing in computer networking and embedded systems. PLVision has offices in Krakow, Poland, and in Ukraine: Lviv, Odesa, Kyiv, and Kharkiv (currently relocated). Founded in 2007, the company helps networking industry leaders and ambitious startups in the U.S., Israel, and the EU countries to launch innovative products.

Vacancy responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Validate new DASH functionality for modern Data Processing Unit (DPU)/ Intelligence Processing Unit (IPU) systems
‚Ä¢ Test implementation, execution and automation
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with the open-source community on alignment and introduce new functionality
‚Ä¢ Prepare test case reports
‚Ä¢ Perform test analysis and debugging

Vacancy requirements:
‚Ä¢ Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related technical discipline
‚Ä¢ 2+ years of commercial experience in Embedded Software Validation and Test Automation
‚Ä¢ Good knowledge of Python
‚Ä¢ Good knowledge of Linux, at least as a user
‚Ä¢ Experience with Linux tools and Bash
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of test frameworks like Pytest, PTF, etc.
‚Ä¢ Basic network knowledge (L2/L3, routing/switching)
‚Ä¢ Understanding of CI/CD, Jenkins
‚Ä¢ Good communication skills and the ability to work in a team
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of technical English at Intermediate level or higher

Vacancy plus options:
Experience with open-source projects
SAI(Switch Abstraction Interface)/SONiC (Software for Open Networking in the Cloud) validation experience
Familiarity with Linux network tools
Experience in virtualization, containerization and Python virtual environments
Experience with software and hardware traffic generators (e.g., IXIA, Scapy, etc.)

title: Middle Python Developer
description:
At the project, we solve transportation challenges across the globe for millions of travelers every day, by delivering real-time transit data feeds to journey planners and a platform for transit authorities and operators. Our clients include Google, Apple, Microsoft, and public sector organizations such as the Department of Transport and Transport for West Midlands.

Our Analytics platform allows our users to understand the performance of their transit network. Real-time and timetable data is consumed and analysed to determine on-time performance of vehicles operating the transit network. Data is converted to OLAP cubes to support querying of performance data.

Requirements:
Primary technologies that the team uses are: Python, SQL, AWS, including Kinesis Data Firehose
S3, RedShift, PostgreSQL, Apache Flink, Apache Airflow
Tools used by the team: Jira, Gitlab, Docker
In addition, we also make use of Apache Spark, GraphQL
This role sees the individual augmented within the existing development team
Key personal qualities that we look for in our team members are:
Supportive of colleagues, taking time to assist others and help them learn
Willingness to collaborate when problem-solving and bring ideas based on other experience
Ability to effectively plan work with the team and then deliver on commitments
Focus on the deliverables of the team, stepping out of their own role to help others in the team get the team commitments completed

Job Responsibilities:
General Engineering responsibilities
New features implementation
Refactoring
Working with the professional team / outstaff model
Our Analytic team is split into two, one team looking after the data warehouse, the other the web application middleware (Django) and front end (Angular)
Both teams use a Scrum methodology with two-week sprint cycles. Prior to the sprint, the teams will work with the product team to understand the items that will be included in future sprints and identify the necessary work. This process includes all members of the team, as do the other sprint ceremonies
Whilst implementation will be carried out in the context of a sprint, the Principal Engineer will not necessarily contribute to deliverables of the sprint, instead working to identify improvements in our data warehouse solution, and supporting other team members as they implement changes in the sprint

title: Senior Python Developer
description:

Responsibilities:

Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams including front-end engineers, product managers, and designers to define and implement APIs that meet business requirements.

title: AI Developer (Next js and Python)
description:
Join our team at Webicient, an innovative web agency in Sweden that creates stunning websites and applications. We're on a mission to revolutionize the way businesses operate by empowering growth with intelligent and adaptive solutions. That's why we're building a cutting-edge AI application using OpenAI's framework, amongst others, to act as an assistant for us and our clients in the marketing and development sector.

As an AI Developer, you'll be responsible for developing and implementing AI solutions using different LLMS and agent frameworks, integrating them with various platforms and systems to ensure seamless functionality. You'll collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and deploy state-of-the-art AI models and algorithms while staying up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI, machine learning, and neural network technologies.

We're looking for someone with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (Master's or Ph.D. preferred) and proven experience in AI development, with a focus on OpenAI's framework. You should have a strong understanding of various neural network architectures, such as CNNs, RNNs, LSTMs, GANs, and Transformer models. You should also have proficiency in Python and familiarity with AI/ML libraries and frameworks, such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Keras.

At Webicient, we offer a collaborative and innovative work environment, where you'll have the opportunity to work with a team of passionate and talented professionals. You'll have the chance to work on cutting-edge AI technology and make a real impact. We value communication, problem-solving, and critical thinking skills, so if you're someone who thrives in a fast-paced team environment and has a deeper understanding of Javascript, we encourage you to apply.

Desired skills include experience in marketing and development-related AI applications, familiarity with API integration and development, knowledge of cloud computing platforms, such as AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure, and experience with Agile methodologies and CI/CD processes.

To apply, please submit your resume, cover letter, and any relevant work samples or GitHub repositories. Join us in building a brighter future for businesses with AI!

title: Python Developer
description:
Python Developer (Remote)


Silicon Valley Commerce LLC, a fast-growing e-commerce company based in the United States, is looking to hire a Python Developer to join our dynamic and growing team. This is a permanent and full-time work-from-home position. The ideal candidate will provide technical expertise in the creation of intuitive web applications that support the company‚Äôs business growth initiatives. You will be responsible for planning, building, and maintaining systems that support our core team as we explore new business opportunities, automations and innovations.


The ideal candidate will enjoy working both collaboratively and independently, favors iterative development approaches that would result in high-quality systems, possesses a range of technical skills, and exhibits a willingness to learn (and advocate for) new technologies when appropriate.


This position will collaborate with our stakeholders and/or relevant teams across all departments to implement agreed-upon projects, while working closely within the Engineering Team/Data Team. This position will report directly to the Engineering Tech Lead and Head of DTC Analytics.


Job Type: Full-Time
Job Level: Entry, Mid-Senior
Hourly Rate: $37 - $52 an hour (entry level), $29 - $65 an hour (mid-senior level) ‚Äì depending on experience


Key Duties and Responsibilities:


- Collaborate with project managers, designers, and other developers to understand project requirements and objectives.
- Work with Technical Leads to help translate business requirements into technical requirements, participate in code reviews, develop POCs, and maintain existing applications.
- Plan and assist in managing the integration and implementation of new technology.
- Guide and provide direction for projects.
- Responsible for solving highly technical and complex problems for several projects.
- Develop enterprise-level application or system solutions including major enhancements and interfaces, functions and features.
- Develop programming and development standards and procedures as well as programming architectures for code reuse.
- Troubleshoot cloud issues/failures and resolves alerts and performs remediation activities.
- Develop sound and trusted relationships with internal and external customers by providing accurate and efficient technical/engineering support and updates.
- Write high quality, maintainable code as a core member of the Engineering Team.
- Maintain the quality of your own code and provide feedback and support to the Engineering Team.
- Develop support documentation including risk logs and requirement specifications.
- Stay updated on industry trends and best practices to continually improve our technology.
- Employ a flexible attitude and can work constructively in a diverse team setting.
- Other ad hoc tasks that may be assigned from time to time.




Experience and Qualities we look for:


- Able to demonstrate with 4 to 5 years experience as Full-Stack Python Developer or similar role.
- With 3+ years experience designing, building, and deploying web applications.
- Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript and related frameworks/libraries (e.g., Angular, etc.).
- Solid understanding of responsive design principles and cross-browser compatibility.
- Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and modern development tools.
- Knowledge of SEO principles and best practices.
- Proven hands-on programming experience in Python language.
- Familiarity with Django framework.
- Understanding of UX/UI design principles.
- Experience with MySQL.
- Strong communication skills and ability to project-manage.
- Proven ability to build strong relationships at all levels throughout an organization in a collaborative and multicultural environment.
- A self-directed individual able to adapt quickly to changes in priorities and business conditions.
- Experience and comfort working in a fast-paced business environment with ability to consistently meet company goals.
- Superior analytical and critical thinking skills with the ability to develop and communicate complex business strategies.
- You are hungry to learn, work, make changes and improve.
- Excellent organizational and time management skills.
- Possess rigorous attention to detail and impeccable work ethics.
- You are amazing at multitasking and you prioritize effectively.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills in the English language.
- Basic Advanced experience with Microsoft Excel and Google Sheets.
- Able to work in the Eastern Standard Time Zone (UTC-05:00)
- Has a conducive work-from-home setup and a stable internet connection for team and client meetings.




Desired Education:


BS/MS in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Systems, Web Development, or equivalent experience.


Bonus Points:


Remote experience
- E-commerce experience (Amazon, Etsy, eBay, Shopify, Walmart, etc.)
- Familiarity with Slack, Asana, Hubstaff, and Google Suites




Important Please apply with your resume showing relevant work experience. Candidates should send a link to a portfolio of your work on Behance or Dribble and Github as proof of your experience and abilities.

title: Full-stack Developer (Python, Node.js, React)
description:
We are looking for a Senior Full-stack Engineer (Python, Node.js, React) who will join a team of a Pypestream product.

You would be embedded in the Pypestream Pro team and be working directly with the production team on their existing product offerings. Updating Python code, improving it, and adding features and functionality to the frontend (React) and some middleware (NodeJS).

This platform will be a combination of low code / no code tools that will be developed by our engineering team and be used by our customers to create customer service automation solutions which can be delivered to their customers. We are looking for a ‚Äúdifference maker‚Äù Senior Engineer who‚Äôs proficient with front-end and backend technologies and is truly a full-stack developer that enjoy‚Äôs creating amazing front-end technology but can write optimized and performant back-end code ‚Äî someone who loves to be part of the end-to-end development process. As a Senior Engineer, you‚Äôll translate product requirements into true product technology solutions that will ship to our customers in a timely manner and committed to both quality and security. You‚Äôll work directly with our Product team to ensure that you have an understanding of the requirements and will coach, mentor and lead your teammates through to successful launches of releases and follow and help develop engineering "best practice‚Äú‚Äô. As a Senior Engineer you will be a difference maker on the team and lead by example with a ‚ÄúGive a damn‚Äù mentality, motivated, and great with figuring out solutions to a given problem.

What we expect
- 6+ years of demonstrable experience
- Strong proficiency in Python
- Strong proficiency in GraphQL
- Proficiency in Node.js, React.js
- Proficiency with PostgreSQL or another SQL technology
- Experience with common front-end tooling and technologies: Webpack, NPM, NPM Publishing, Cypress, ViTest, Sass (SCSS), Pub/Sub, Websockets, JSON Schema, Isomorphic rendering, Monorepo experience, Prettier, Eslint, Stylelint, etc
- Self-starter with good communication skills and at a senior level who can take on complicated tasks.
- Experience with code versioning tools with Git, Github Actions
- Experience State Management, ideally x-state
- Strong understanding of Web Components (i.e. Lit Element)

Nice to have
- Docker, Container experience
- Worked with automation tools such as UIPath, Blue Prisma or n8n
- Chat bot experience
- Developing low code / no code tooling
- Design Systems

What you‚Äôll be doing?
- Work as a full-stack developer on existing offering and be working with Python, Node.js and React.
- Updating Python code, improving it, but also adding features and functionality to the frontend (React) and also some middleware (NodeJS).
- Lead small to mid-sized engineering projects but also be a highly productive individual contributor.
- Write modern, high quality frontend / full-stack glue code connecting backend and frontend systems; ‚Äúback of the frontend‚Äù application / business logic.
- Shared responsibility in code reviews, tag-team on solving problems.
- Contribute in improving automated testing coverage (unit, E2E, VRT).
- Writing modern, high quality frontend / full-stack glue code connecting backend and frontend systems; ‚Äúback of the frontend‚Äù application / business logic
- Conduct Cross-team collaboration (other frontend / full-stack engineers, design, and product)
- Provide feedback on design (Figma) comps, product requirement docs; break down and define the work (for self + delegation)
- Help your team write better, more maintainable code.

Hiring Process
Pre-screen interview with a recruiter;
Technical interview with CTO;
Final interview with the client.

title: Senior Python Backend Engineer
description:
How old is the project? What stage is it at?
We are in the ed-tech space helping hundreds of thousands of students deal with academic hurdles and questions. We have been around since 2014, overgrowing every year. Furthermore, we are currently working on expanding the functionality of our product, all while focusing on improving customer experience and increasing our financial metrics.
Our company is a B2B2C educational platform that provides academic paper writing services. Our clients can choose the type of work, set requirements and deadlines, and choose the author. In addition, online chat allows customers and authors to communicate with each other to clarify.
We also provide services for checking papers for plagiarism, editing and correcting text, and training and advice on improving research paper writing skills. Our team of writers consists of only the best experts, who are rigorously screened and constantly improve their skills.
Our platform also provides the opportunity to receive feedback from authors and ask for technical support and help in choosing the best work.
We constantly improve our platform and services to provide our customers with the highest convenience and quality.
Our support team is always available to help customers with any questions regarding our platform. We strive to ensure that our clients have only a positive experience with us and recommend us to their friends and colleagues.

What do you need to do?
Write clean and well-structured code that is easy to read and maintain.
Use version control to manage code changes and collaborate with other developers.
Follow security best practices when handling sensitive data or user information.
Use automated testing tools to ensure code quality and reduce the risk of bugs.
Document your code and write clear and concise comments.
Use modular design principles to make your code more flexible and reusable.
Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies.
Use design patterns and best practices to make your application more maintainable and extensible.

Technologies:
Python 3.x, DRF, Django Channels, Redis, PostgreSQL, Elasticsearch, AWS

Work experience:
5+ years of commercial experience with Python 3;
1+ years of experience with designing, implementing REST API (DRF, Fast API);
Experience working with relational and NoSQL databases(PostgreSQL, MongoDB);
Experience working on Linux, Docker;
Clear understanding of high-quality code, unit testing, software design and design patterns;
Exceptional problem-solving, technical and data analysis skills;
Experience with Scrum/Agile methodology, CI/CD.
Qualities: Star performer, Team player, Fast, Strong ownership
Additional hard skills:
Some experience with Elasticsearch;
Experience with Kubernetes, Clouds(AWS/GCP)
Questions and Answers:
- Does the job come with a probation period, and if so, how long does it last?Yes, there is a three-month probation period.
- What is the expected work schedule?
Full-time, flexible, please start no later than 11:00 (on average 8 hours per day). The office in Kyiv is open from 9:00 to 20:00. You can work remotely and also you can choose hybrid mode where you can combine working on-site and remotely.
- How many vacation and sick days are provided?
Annual paid vacation ‚Äì 21 working days; Paid confirmed sick leave; 6 unconfirmed sick days/days off a year.

What social package and benefits are offered?
- English courses (up to 80 USD/month after successful completion of the probation period)
- Compensation for the cost of a subscription sports center (up to 80 USD/month after successful completion of the probation period)
- Medical insurance (50% after successful completion of the probation period) or $200 a year for health care
- Corporate events

Hiring process:
- HR-call with Recruiter
- Interview with the Hiring manager (1 hour)
- Trial day
- Reference check
- Proposal for cooperation with Develux

Please note that feedback with results of the CV review will be provided only in the event of a decision to further consider your candidacy.
Otherwise, your data will be retained in the company's CV database, and we will gladly contact you if a suitable vacancy becomes available. The consideration period is 10 working days.

We believe that people with different perspectives and lived experiences drive the company to create unique solutions.

- Understanding of distributed computing, preferably Apache Spark.
- Capability to integrate and modify existing recommendation systems with dynamic datasets.
- Upper Intermediate or higher English level.

Responsibilities:

- Deploy the existing recommendation system on a chosen cloud platform.
- Migrate song datasets to a database on the cloud or server.
- Implement an authentication process using the Spotify API to extract liked songs from users and store them in a database.
- Modify the recommendation system's code to fetch data from the new databases instead of CSV files.
- Complete and deploy a "new song extractor script" on the server or cloud, ensuring its operation via Airflow.
- Optimize the recommendation system for scalability, possibly integrating distributed computing solutions like Apache Spark.

Project description:
The project involves enhancing a recommendation system for Spotify, specifically designed for a mobile web platform. The system is aimed at personalizing music experiences by intelligently suggesting songs. The backend team's primary task is to deploy the system on a suitable cloud server, ensure efficient data management by transitioning song datasets to a database, and refine the system's interaction with Spotify for user authentication and data extraction. Additionally, the project demands the adaptation of the recommendation engine to dynamically use database inputs and the potential expansion to utilize distributed computing for handling increased data volumes. This role is pivotal in achieving a seamless, scalable solution that enhances user engagement with personalized music recommendations.

title: Senior Backend Engineer (Python)
description:
We are looking for a person who is passionate about development and is excited to join the team of our Engineers

What you will be doing:
Crafting an elegant, resilient, and useful distributed system for booking business travels.

You certainly:
Have 5+ years of strong experience working with Python and Django and a continuous desire to improve your skills.
Have experience with asynchronous programming (asyncio, aiohttp)
Are familiar with at least one RDBMS (Postgres) and with NoSQL solutions (MongoDB)
Can write unit tests and autotests
Have a high level of responsibility and independence
Have a B2+ (upper Intermediate +) level of English and are ready to use it in everyday communication
Have experience with Docker and K8s
Have experience with elastic search
You can be located either in Ukraine or Europe, but you have to be initially a citizen of Ukraine by birth and grow up in Ukraine, so we have a common mentality and values.

You probably:
Have contributed to an open-source project
Have experience in mentoring newcomers and leading small project groups

Who we are:
We are a tech team of adventurous travellers, who were once a part of YCombinator alumni ‚Äî GetGoing Inc., founded in 2012 by Harvard, Stanford, and Berkeley graduates. We also raised ~$10M in venture capital from Silicon Valley.
In 2016 we joined BCD Travel (www.bcdtravel.com), a global corporate travel management company with annual sales of $25 billion, to bring our unique technology of hotel booking to BCD Travel‚Äôs products.

What we do:
The product we develop is a B2B booking platform for business trips, which helps users book hotels, flights, and cars. It provides both business travelers and their travel agents with detailed itineraries and the best booking options. Every day thousands of business travellers across the world use our software built on modern technology.

We use:
On FE: ES6 and React/Redux.
On BE: Python 3 as well as: Django, DRF, Celery, Gevent, aiohttp, Airflow, Postgresql, Redis, Memcache, RabbitMQ, ElasticSearch, Terraform, Ansible, Stackstorm, Splunk, Docker. Everything is running on AWS.

What we offer:
Results-oriented startup mindset with a stable business model backed by a billion-dollar global travel company.
Money, of course. Medical insurance. English courses. Cookies
Conferences, workshops, certifications refund.
A friendly, professional, and highly skilled team working with the newest technologies.
A great office location in the very center of Kyiv near metro stations Zoloti Vorota/ Teatralna/ Khreschatyk (we have an extra ‚Äúcoffee‚Äù kitchen for coffee geeks, a game zone with a kicker and a bomb shelter in the building)
Flexible working hours and the ability to choose between office, remote, or a mix of both.
24 working days of vacation + 6 covered sick days.
A chance to help craft our tools, processes, and culture.
A lab day once a month to dedicate to a project of your own or a study project.
Opportunities for career growth.

title: Senior Backend Developer (Python)
description:

title: Python  Developer
description:
We are inviting an experienced Python Developer to join the team of professionals at InStandart.
We are looking for a person for long-term cooperation who likes to develop themselves and wants to apply their knowledge to interesting projects.

This is a full-time remote role for a Python Developer. The Python Developer will be responsible for designing and creating highly scalable and secure RESTful API services on AWS Lambda using Cognito and DynamoDB that support the integration of various platforms. The Python Developer will also provide technical support on his code and continuously improve the existing codebase.

‚ÄãKnowledge that will be necessary for your effective work:‚Äã

Qualifications
5+ years experience with Python, Flask;
Proficient in Python, with knowledge of at least one Python web framework, such as Flask;
Understanding of basic front-end technologies, such as React, JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3;
Knowledge of NoSQL database such as DynamoDB;
Familiarity with event-driven programming in Python;
Understanding of fundamental design principles behind a scalable application;
Strong unit testing and debugging skills and experience with Git and Git workflows;
An associate-level AWS certification (a plus);
Experience with AWS lambda;
Strong communication, problem-solving, and organizational skills.


‚Äã‚ÄãInStandart offers:‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã

Experienced and friendly colleagues who are ready to share knowledge;
Professional and career development;
Comfortable working environment;
Flexible schedule and remote work;
Paid vacation.

We will be glad to consider your application!

title: Python AI/ML Engineer
description:
Trembit is video solution provider that helps clients to utilize video streaming in full with their products. We make R&D or use existing video solutions. Among them: video chats, telehealth, broadcast studios, video convertion, transcribe and recording in real-time.

Project Technologies:
Python, Open-source LLM‚Äôs, OpenAI, AWS, GCP.

Project duration: 6+ months.

Tasks:
‚Äî Conduct in-depth investigations into AI/ML domains aligned with our company interests, ensuring our projects remain at the forefront of technological advancements.
‚Äî Perform comprehensive analyses of client requirements, crafting AI-driven proposals that address their unique challenges and objectives.
‚Äî Expertly select and meticulously optimize Large Language Models (LLMs) or other AI instruments to suit project-specific needs, ensuring peak performance and efficiency.
‚Äî Design and implement sophisticated AI-powered APIs, focusing on capabilities like transcription, summarization, and advanced image processing, and ensure their seamless integration into both demonstration settings and live operational environments.

Must have skills (hard, technical):
‚Äî Knowledge and experience with Python.
‚Äî Solid understanding of machine learning concepts, algorithms, and techniques.
‚Äî Understanding principles of LLMs, open-source and commercials, training, deploying, optimizing.
‚Äî Upper-Intermediate English or higher (ability to speak with the clients verbally).

Must have skills (soft):
‚Äî Own problems end-to-end, and are willing to pick up whatever knowledge you‚Äôre missing to get the job done.
‚Äî Have the ability to move fast in an environment where things are sometimes loosely defined and may have competing priorities or deadlines.
‚Äî Excellent communication and teamwork skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.

As a plus skills (hard, technical):
‚Äî Knowledge of cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) and experience with containerization (e.g., Docker) is a plus.
‚Äî Knowledge of the LangChain framework.
‚Äî Basic knowledge of NumPy, WebSockets, oAuth.
‚Äî Experience with OpenCV and TensorFlow.

Education: Technical education (Math oriented).

Interview stages:
Technical part (1 stage): tech online interview with –°–¢–û+CEO.

Work schedule:
The full-time work ‚Äî 100% remote. Flexible workday (start from 8.00 to 11.00).

title: Middle+/Senior Backend Python Developer
description:
ROLE DESCRIPTION AND REQUIREMENTS:
We are seeking a talented Senior Backend Python Developer to join our team. In this role, you will be responsible for designing and developing APIs, building microservices, deploying services in Google Cloud, and organizing CI/CD processes. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Python development and experience with the specified tech stack.

STACK:
Python, FastAPI, Gunicorn, Postgres, Redis, MySQL, Docker, Docker Compose, Google Cloud CLI, Lex-Yacc Parser, Linux.
It will be a plus if you have worked with Google Kubernetes Engine.

REQUIREMENTS:
- Strong proficiency in Python programming language.
- Experience in designing and developing APIs, preferably using FastAPI.
- Solid knowledge of microservice architecture and design patterns.
- Proficiency in working with databases such as Postgres, Redis, and MySQL.
- Experience with containerization using Docker and Docker Compose.
- Familiarity with Google Cloud Platform, including deployment and management of services.
- Strong understanding of CI/CD processes and tools.

RESPONSIBILITIES:
- Designing and implementing robust and scalable APIs for our conversational AI Assistants and Intelligent Agents.
- Developing microservices using Python, FastAPI, Gunicorn, and other relevant technologies.
- Deploying services on the Google Cloud platform, utilizing the Google Cloud CLI.
- Ensuring seamless integration of Intelligent Agents with corporate ERPs, CRMs, and knowledge bases.
- Collaborating with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate them into technical solutions.
- Writing clean, maintainable, and efficient code that follows best practices.
- Organizing CI/CD processes to enable smooth and automated deployments.
- Collaborating with DevOps and infrastructure teams to optimize the deployment pipeline.
- Conducting code reviews and providing constructive feedback to team members.
- Staying updated with the latest industry trends and technologies to drive innovation within the company.

PREFERED QUALIFICATIONS:
- Knowledge of Lex-Yacc Parser and Linux will be advantageous.
- Familiarity with Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) is a plus.
- Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.
- Strong communication and collaboration skills to work effectively in a team environment.


ABOUT PROJECT:
The platform enables the development of conversational AI Assistants, Chatbots, and Intelligent Agents based on LLMs with emotional and conscious behavior, without the need for programming skills.
Unlike ChatGPT, the Intelligent Agents can be specifically trained to adhere to corporate playbooks and knowledge bases, ensuring that they represent your brand accurately and effectively while engaging with clients.


YOUR BENEFITS:
- Extensive experience and remote work possibilities;
- Hands-on training support;
- Paid vacation and sick days;
- Insurance compensation;
- Partial compensation of gym membership, English courses, books, materials for developing etc.;
- Unique company that is focused on the solutions development for specific business niches;
- Opportunity to get more experience with events, conferences, seminars, master classes and training at the company‚Äôs expense;
- Best management and team support: we are always happy to hear from colleagues about their business & technology ideas;
- Opportunity to implement your ideas on our internal projects;
- Regular salary revision.

title: Data Labelling and Datasets Engineer
description:
DeepX is looking for Data Labelling and Datasets Engineer.

–®—É–∫–∞—î–º–æ —Å–ø–µ—Ü—ñ–∞–ª—ñ—Å—Ç—ñ–≤ –Ω–∞ —Ä–æ–∑–º—ñ—Ç–∫—É –¥–∞—Ç–∞—Å–µ—Ç—ñ–≤ –¥–ª—è Computer Vision —Ç–∞ —ñ–Ω—à–∏—Ö AI/ML –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç—ñ–≤.

Please DO NOT respond if you are not able to fluently communicate in Ukrainian. Our team communicates in Ukrainian internally.

You will help our Machine Learning team to create powerful ML and Computer Vision applications for our clients globally.

Knowledge of Python, Data Science and Computer Vision will be considered an advantage.

You will have career growth opportunities including:
* Senior Dataset Engineer
* Dataset Manager
* Machine Learning Engineer
* Solutions Architect

Suggestion: we strongly recommend you record a 1 minute video of yourself + your screen using Loom. You can either talk about yourself or anything you like or show how you do data labeling if you know how to do that.
This video will help us verify that you have the necessary basic communication and presentation skills to work as part of our team.
Please use Ukrainian (and optionally English) in your recording.

title: Junior Python Developer (full stack)
description:

title: Reef Technologies Senior Python Backend Engineer
description:
We‚Äôre about to convince you that you need a new job‚Ä¶ and that you‚Äôve just found the perfect opportunity. We‚Äôre steadily growing, and we‚Äôre continuously looking to expand our team with experienced Python engineers.


Join Reef Technologies and work on your own terms:

-Contribute from wherever you like ‚Äì we are fully remote.
-Pick your own working hours individually. We only hold ~2 calls per week.
-Work with dynamic startups from all over the world on the projects of your choice.
-Contribute to the decision-making process and influence the way we operate.
-Choose the projects you want to work on. We receive enough offers to only accept the ones that we like.

Remuneration on a B2B contract:

-45-70 USD per hour, or
-7560-11760 USD a month if you do 40 hours per week
-Flexible work schedule (measured by time tracker).
-We usually adjust the hourly rates once a year.


Additional perks of working at Reef Technologies:

-We offer a stable position at an established company in a booming industry.
-All decision-makers, including the Founder, are Senior Python Engineers.
-We cover reasonable coworking space expenses.
-You‚Äôll be assigned a private assistant to save time on personal obligations.
-You‚Äôll get financial help to buy the necessary hardware.
-You‚Äôll work in a multicultural environment where everyone has a say.
-You‚Äôll get to use your English skills on an everyday basis.
-You‚Äôll get to take advantage of our flexible leave policy.

And don‚Äôt forget that you‚Äôll be free to work wherever and whenever you want to. We believe that you‚Äôll do your part by independently taking the right decisions.

Our only expectation timewise is for you to contribute around 30‚Äì40 hours per week, which we believe is optimal for sustainable full-time engagement in a remote setting. You‚Äôre free to distribute those hours throughout the week in the way that you find the most convenient, within reason.

We want to ensure proper work-life balance and create an environment where you can focus on your code while at work, and on whatever brings you pleasure in your free time.

That is why, as one of our benefits, we offer the services of a private assistant. Appointments, research, online shopping, and more ‚Äì you choose which tasks to pass on to your assistant.


Expert Python engineer wanted

Do you have at least 5 years of programming experience ‚Äì not necessarily professional ‚Äì including at least a year with Python? If so, you have probably written so much Python code in your life that at times you want to express your thoughts through list comprehensions. Thanks to your extensive experience, you can solve any problem that gets thrown at you, but that is not enough ‚Äì you come up with multiple solutions for every issue, and you always know how to choose the most Pythonic one.

And that is all a good sign ‚Äì a sign that means you‚Äôre exactly the type of person that we‚Äôre looking for! If you‚Äôd like to see what it‚Äôs like to work with Python natives who all bring their long-standing expertise to the table, please get in touch. Spoiler alert: it‚Äôs great.

We have good manners, though, so let us introduce ourselves first. Do you want to find out more about the company? We were hoping you‚Äôd ask.


Get to know your future company

Reef Technologies is a fully remote Python backend software house. We‚Äôre a small, agile, senior-only team. All of our current members have more than seven years of strong experience, so we don‚Äôt ever have anything urgent to fix. We only deliver stable solutions, as we have developed a system that has delivered more than a hundred challenging projects in the last three years. We‚Äôd like to improve it even further with you on the team.

The demand for our work is extremely high, so we get to pick and choose the projects that we want to take on ‚Äì and the same goes for you. Before you‚Äôre assigned to a project, you‚Äôll be personally asked if you‚Äôre interested in that particular task and if you don‚Äôt like it, you‚Äôll just get something else. That‚Äôs the beauty of having a sales team that greatly outperforms our delivery capacity.


Let your code have a real impact

At Reef Technologies, we don‚Äôt have managers. Thanks to the group decision-making framework, Sociocracy 3.0, every member of the team can be sure that their opinion will be valued. (Check it out here, you‚Äôll wonder how you‚Äôd survived in traditional organizations until now!)

The Founder of our company doesn‚Äôt only take care of sales, bureaucracy, and client relationships - he is also a programmer, so all of us really do work together and understand the job at hand.

What type of projects would you work on? We mainly accept offers from startups and small-to-medium businesses from the US, the UK, and Canada. Some projects may only last a couple of hours, while others take even a few years for us to complete. There is one thing that you can be sure of, though - that it will always be your personal choice whether to work on a particular project or reject it. What would you have thought about these?

-financial data warehouse, which aggregates over 31 000 time series into a few hundred charts for a fintech company from London
-graph data search/visualization system for auditors/investigators from Norway
-super scalable WAF optimized down to extremely low running costs for a client from Chicago, IL
-multisource cloud object synthesizer library for a storage provider from San Mateo, CA
-report generator/inventory tracker for an e-commerce/healthcare company from Canada
-k8s-based revenue optimizer for large private GPU compute clusters in North America
-paper product level tracker for toilet cleaners from Canada
-hydrant certification report generator for Australian plumbers
-multi-tenant hospitality management system for large properties in the US
-large scale information display system for retailers (international)

We have already delivered those, but you can be sure we‚Äôve got even more exciting projects coming up in the future.

All that without ever setting foot in an office. We have completed those projects ‚Äì and many more ‚Äì from the comfort of our own homes, from tropical beaches and from our favorite coffee shops. Some of us work early in the morning, others start off late in the night. Each of us is free to choose their own programming environment. We know our engineers are competent enough to organize their work and achieve top productivity in their own way. Do you think you'd enjoy this type of freedom? Become one of us and make the world a better place by delivering more than just lines of code.


Want to know more?

-Check out the Reef Technologies Handbook to see our company policies (https://github.com/reef-technologies/handbook).
-Want to see what our clients have to say about our work? We‚Äôre quite proud of our Clutch profile (https://clutch.co/profile/reef-technologies).

title: Python Lead
description:
Job Description

Our client - a SaaS platform for managing expert networks that helps make better decisions is looking for a skillful Python Lead to join their team in Kyiv.

About the company

This platform provides a comprehensive primary research and expert networking service to institutional investors, consultants and corporate clients around the world. Its advantage is the speed and accuracy, it delivers actionable intelligence and relevant experts to the customers, giving them the edge they need to achieve their commercial ambitions. This is made possible by technology which is driven by artificial intelligence, separating this platform from other providers of market information.

The company was founded in 2018 in London and currently has 4 offices around the world, including the new one in Lisbon.

About the role

We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Software Engineer with a strong background in Python and expertise in designing, developing, implementing, and maintaining production services on AWS. The ideal candidate should have a minimum of 5 years of experience in software engineering and a solid understanding of advanced design concepts such as message queues, SQL vs NoSQL databases, and high-loaded service availability.

In this role, you will have a critical impact on the business, working on various revenue generation streams and contributing to our technological USP‚Äôs. You will be responsible for leading the technical advancement for key strategic business work stream including the market-leading survey platform, transcription services and GenAI projects, surveys and transcription services and will work closely with different stakeholders to ensure the delivery of high-quality tech designs. The ability to effectively manage and oversee multiple Python services within a large system is essential. You should also be comfortable being involved with the business side of operations and be excited about the interesting challenges this role presents.

If you are a motivated and experienced Software Engineer who enjoys leading a team, driving technical innovation, and making a significant impact on a growing organisation, we would love to hear from you.

Responsibilities:

- Act as a technical lead in a product squad, actively participating and leading various agile ceremonies such as grooming and planning sessions as well as code reviews
- Lead a team of software engineers and provide technical guidance and mentorship
- Collaborate with stakeholders to understand business requirements and translate them into technical solutions
- Design, develop, and maintain scalable and high-performance production services on AWS
- Ensure the quality and reliability of the software through thorough testing and code reviews
- Stay up to date with industry trends and best practices, and drive the adoption of new technologies and methodologies
- Manage and prioritize multiple projects, balancing technical requirements and business impact

Qualifications

Requirements

- 2+ years of experience in team leadership, managing and mentoring junior team members
- Minimum 5 years professional software development experience, prominently utilising Python as the primary language, within a commercial setting
- Experience working with Postgres
- Familiarity with advanced design concepts
- Upper Intermediate/Advanced level of English or higher

title: Senior/Lead Python Software Engineer
description:
We are inviting a Senior/Lead Python Software Engineer to join our team.

The project is a hosting platform. We are transforming an old-school data center company into a cloud-focused organization and building out the infrastructure and tools from the ground up.

Project benefits:

- The opportunity to design (along with client's CTO) and implement cloud services from scratch (CDN, Virtual Private Server, VPN, Application Vending Machine, Kubernetes-As-A-Service, App-As-A-Service). You will also be involved in designing and building internal services (such as ChatOps tool for support).
- The opportunity to work very closely with popular open-source solutions (Kubernetes+Helm, OpenStack, ELK stack, Apache Traffic Control, Apache Airflow).
- The project is already in production, but still in active development. Therefore, on the one hand, there are plenty of interesting challenges and freedom in tech choices, and on the other hand, development practices are already established and all the tools for effective work are in place.

Required skills

‚Ä¢ 5+ years of commercial experience with Python
‚Ä¢ 3+ years XP with Django+DRF
‚Ä¢ 2+ years experience of direct voice communication with English-speaking clients, incl. non-technical ones
‚Ä¢ Experience with Docker
‚Ä¢ Experience with PostgreSQL
‚Ä¢ Deep experience writing unit tests
‚Ä¢ Experience setting up CI/CD pipelines (Github actions preferred)
‚Ä¢ Experience playing Team Lead role
‚Ä¢ Mentorship experience
‚Ä¢ Decent experience of work breakdown for complex functionality
‚Ä¢ Experience in pre-sales activities
‚Ä¢ English level: Upper-Intermediate

Will be a plus

‚Ä¢ Experience with Kubernetes and Helm
‚Ä¢ PHP experience
‚Ä¢ Frontend experience (HTML+Bootstrap+jQuery, ideally - also VueJS)
‚Ä¢ Experience with Ansible
‚Ä¢ Experience with CRMs for hosting providers (WHMCS, EasyDCIM)

Responsibilities

‚Ä¢ Write new and improve existing systems functionality
‚Ä¢ Write effective, scalable code
‚Ä¢ Participate in code reviews
‚Ä¢ Daily communicate with client stakeholders and team
‚Ä¢ Participate in roadmap creation, high-level planning and backlog filling
‚Ä¢ Conduct work breakdown for new assigned functionality, be more owner that doer

Being a member of the CodeIT team means

‚Ä¢ Career Path and growth opportunities (seniority level system, individual development plan, technical leads)
‚Ä¢ Compensation of participation in conferences and workshops, invited experts
‚Ä¢ Development of soft skills (people management and emotional intelligence training)
‚Ä¢ Free access to the company account on Udemy educational platform
‚Ä¢ Internal library
‚Ä¢ Corporate English courses and communication with clients from English-speaking countries
‚Ä¢ Experienced and supportive team members
‚Ä¢ Paid time off (vacation, sick-leave, remote work)
‚Ä¢ Legal support
‚Ä¢ Well-equipped offices located in Kharkiv, Vinnytsia, and Sofia

title: Senior Data Engineer, Python developer (PySpark)
description:
Forecasa, an imaginative and fully remote tech startup providing data and analytics for lenders in the real estate space, is seeking a Senior Data Engineer to join our dynamic team. We are passionate about technology, personal development, and believe in giving our engineers the freedom and autonomy they need to do their best work.

Job Purpose:
As our Senior Data Engineer, you will be tasked with converting our legacy ETL pipelines from SQL to PySpark as well as developing new pipelines in PySpark. You'll collaborate with various team members, including product managers, engineers, and analysts, to meet our data needs and ensure the highest quality.

Responsibilities:
Writing clean, high-quality, performant, maintainable code
System design, and POCs for new features
Support of legacy software components including scaling distributed systems
Unit and integration testing
Conducting code reviews
Crafting code and system documentation
Designing and deploying Kubernetes services on GCP/AWS
Building and maintaining application monitoring tools
Support daily project management and assist junior engineers with business and technical problems
Collaborate with data infrastructure to triage issues and drive them to resolution
Define and manage SLAs for all data sets in your areas of responsibility
Design, develop, and launch new data extraction, transformation, and loading processes in production


Skills:
*Required*: Strong proficiency in Python/PySpark and SQL (Postgres). CI/CD, Pandas, data modeling, database management and optimization, ETL.
*Nice-to-haves*: Familiarty with Airflow, Python NLP libraries, DataBricks, Experience developing, training, tuning, and deploying ML/AI models, OpenCV/OCR experience, Neo4j experience.

Experience:
A minimum of 3 years' experience in a similar role.

Personal Traits:
We operate on a foundation of trust and believe in hiring skilled engineers, giving them the space to excel. As a fully remote team, we need someone comfortable with a high degree of autonomy and self-direction.


Career Development Opportunities:
At Forecasa, personal development is a core value. We make space for you to take classes and learn, fostering an environment that promotes growth.


Interested? Join Forecasa and be a part of our forward-thinking team driving innovation in the tech industry!

title: Python developer
description:
Ciba Health is seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior Python Developer to join our team on a full-time basis. As a Senior Python Developer, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining our web-based applications using Python, ensuring high performance, responsiveness, and scalability. You will work closely with our multidisciplinary team of engineers, designers, and product managers to deliver the best possible solutions for our clients and users.

Responsibilities:
- Design, develop, and maintain high-performance Python applications and APIs
- Integrate user-facing elements developed by front-end developers with server-side logic
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and implement new features
- Identify and solve complex performance issues and architectural challenges
- Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback to ensure code quality and maintainability
- Troubleshoot and resolve bugs, performance issues, and other technical problems
- Keep up-to-date with the latest industry trends, technologies, and best practices

Requirements:
- At least 5 years of experience working with Python and its web frameworks such as Django, Flask, or Pyramid
- Strong knowledge of web technologies, including HTML5, CSS3, JS, GraphQL, Redis, and AWS services such as Cognito, Lambda, and EC2
- Experience with SQL/MariaDB databases and their declarative query languages
- Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git/Gitlab
- Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently
- Experience with RESTful APIs and API integrations
- Solid understanding of object-oriented programming and design patterns
- Excellent communication and teamwork skills
- Familiarity with agile development methodologies and Jira
- DevOps knowledge, with experience in AWS Kubernetes, will be considered a plus
Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field

What We Offer:
- Competitive salary commensurate with experience
- Flexible work schedule and remote work options
- Opportunity to work on challenging projects in a fast-paced, dynamic environment
- Collaborative and supportive team culture
- Opportunities for professional growth and development

About Ciba Health:

Ciba Health is a personalized digital therapeutics and virtual care platform that utilizes a whole-health root-cause approach and cutting-edge technology to prevent and reverse chronic conditions. Our team is dedicated to improving the lives of our clients and users by providing innovative solutions and a seamless user experience. Join us in our mission to revolutionize healthcare.

title: Python Developer / Data Engineer
description:
Zenseact‚Äôs purpose is to make safe and intelligent mobility real, for everyone, everywhere. We develop the complete software stack for ADAS and AD, from sensing to actuation. Our focus is to build a single cutting-edge software platform to serve various levels of autonomy and offer unequaled scalability at the same time. The head office is in Gothenburg, Sweden. Zenseact‚Äôs first self-driving deployment will be launched on the next-generation vehicle platform from Volvo Cars.

Self-driving cars, when real, are estimated to reduce fatal car accidents by more than 85%, saving more than 50,000 persons from dying in car accidents caused by human errors each year. We feel that is a goal worth pursuing.

But technology, software, tools, and datasets would not mean much without the best people behind the wheel to drive them. At Zenseact, some five hundred of the best engineering minds globally, stationed across two continents, are collaborating with the same passion: to bring autonomous driving to the streets for real and create a safer journey for everyone. This is part of our culture and how we work, develop, and grow together.

Apart from your skillset, your mindset will take you even further. With a genuine team-playing attitude and a high feeling of responsibility and thoroughness, you will quickly thrive and grow in your role. We have space for your ambition to mentor others by sharing your knowledge in software craftsmanship.

We strive for a T-shaped competence profile for all team members, so every member must be open to working on all topics relevant to the team while still fostering their special expertise.

Requirements:

Education and Technical Skills:
Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Computer Science or a related field
Proficiency in Python
Experience with multiprocessing/multithreading
Strong knowledge of algorithms, data structures, OOP principles
Experience with PostgreSQL
Experience with Numpy, and Pandas is a plus
Experience with REST APIs (Flask + Gunicorn)
Experience with Redis (or similar) is a plus
Experience with cloud platforms (Azure) is a plus
Experience with Docker
CI/CD practices;
Airflow or RedHat OpenShift experience is a plus.

Communication and Collaboration:
Strong communication skills for technical and non-technical audiences
Collaboration with cross-functional teams
English level: Upper intermediate

Portfolio and Experience:
Demonstrated experience through relevant projects
Optional certifications in relevant technologies

Responsibilities:

Python backend development
Data piplines development
REST API development
Integrations with databases
API documentation and codebase analysys
Code optimization and refactoring

The project involves the development of an internal chatbot based on GenAI that aggregates all the company‚Äôs knowledge and aims to help employees with their routine tasks. The role involves backend development and integration of data sources.

title: Python Developer/AI Specialist (LLMs exp)
description:
üì≤Project:
Is a leading startup and a provider of an AI-driven system that provides the tools and capabilities to create your own character, communicate with it, and build relationships. This is a brand new idea start-up.

Type of cooperation: Full-time

‚ö°Ô∏èYour responsibilities on the project will be:
AI Development:
‚Äî Work on the development and implementation of open source AI models, with a specific focus on image generation models (stabled dffusion) and LLMs (pygmalion, llama2) .
‚Äî Collaborate with data scientists and machine learning engineers to integrate AI capabilities into applications.
Scalability:
‚Äî Design and implement scalable solutions to handle large datasets and ensure optimal performance of AI applications.
‚Äî Identify and address bottlenecks in the system to enhance scalability.
Stateless Application Development:
‚Äî Develop stateless applications using Python and related technologies.
‚Äî Ensure the seamless integration of AI components into stateless architectures.
Image Generation Models:
‚Äî Leverage expertise in image generation models (e.g., GANs, VAEs) to contribute to projects involving image synthesis and manipulation.
Large Language Models (LLMs):
‚Äî Work with Large Language Models (LLMs) to enhance natural language understanding and generation within applications.
Collaboration:
‚Äî Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, frontend developers, and DevOps engineers.
‚Äî Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members.
Optimization:
‚Äî Optimize existing AI models, with a specific focus on image generation models and LLMs, for improved efficiency and resource utilization.
‚Äî Stay updated on the latest advancements in AI, especially in image and language domains, and contribute ideas for continuous improvement.
Documentation:
‚Äî Document code, processes, and procedures related to image generation models and LLMs to facilitate knowledge sharing within the team.

You can be part of the following team: CTO, 1 front end from Softermii, 1 back-end from Softermii + QA + AI engineer

üóûOur requirements to you:
‚Äî Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
‚Äî Minimum of 3 years of professional experience as a Python Developer.
‚Äî Upper-Intermediate English level.

Technical Skills:
‚Äî Proficiency in Python and experience with open source AI frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch).
‚Äî Strong understanding of scalable and stateless application development.
AI Expertise:
‚Äî Hands-on experience working with and implementing AI models in real-world applications.
‚Äî Familiarity with natural language processing, computer vision, or other AI domains.
Communication Skills:
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
‚Äî Ability to communicate technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Problem-Solving:
‚Äî Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a keen attention to detail.
Adaptability:
‚Äî Ability to adapt to new technologies and methodologies in a dynamic work environment.
Team Player:
‚Äî Proven ability to work effectively in a collaborative team environment.
Large Language Models (LLMs):
‚Äî Work with Large Language Models (LLMs) to enhance natural language understanding and generation within applications.

üí•It would be cool if you have:
‚Äî Experience working with image generation models (e.g., GANs, VAEs).
‚Äî Proven track record of successful projects involving image synthesis, manipulation, or natural language understanding.
‚Äî Familiarity with frameworks and libraries specific to image generation and natural language processing.

üë®‚ÄçüíªWho will you have the opportunity to meet during the hiring process (stages):
Call, HR, PM interview, Tech interview, Final interview with the client

ü•ØWhat we can offer you:
‚Äî We have stable and highly-functioning processes ‚Äî everyone has their own role and clear responsibilities, so decisions are made quickly and without unnecessary approvals.
‚Äî You will have enough independence to make decisions that can affect not only the project but also the work of the company.
‚Äî We are a team of like-minded experts who create interesting products during working hours and enjoy spending free time together.
‚Äî Do you like to learn something new in your profession or do you want to improve your English? We will be happy to pay 50% of the cost of courses/conferences/speaking clubs.
‚Äî Do you want an individual development plan? We will form one especially for you + you can count on mentoring from our seniors and leaders.
‚Äî Do you have a friend who is currently looking for new job opportunities? Recommend them to us and get a bonus.
‚Äî Are you thinking about taking out insurance? This is also what we can offer you.
‚Äî And what if you want to relax? Then we have 21 working days off.
‚Äî What if you are feeling bad? You can take 5 sick leaves a year.
‚Äî Do you want to volunteer? We will add you to a chat, where we can get a bulletproof vest, buy a pickup truck or send children‚Äôs drawings to the front.
‚Äî And we have the most empathetic HRs (who also volunteer!). So we are ready to support your well-being in various ways.

üë®‚Äçüè´A little more information that you may find useful:
‚Äî our adaptation period lasts 3 months, this period of time is enough for us to understand each other better;
‚Äî there is a performance review after each year of our collaboration where we use a skills map to track your growth;
‚Äî we really have no boundaries in the truest sense of the word ‚Äî we have flexible working day, remote or office is up to you.

Of course, we have a referral bonus system. So if you have a friend who likes our job opening, you can give us their telegram contact, and we in turn will thank you with a bonus if we start working with them!

title: Engineering Mgr
description:

title: Senior Python/Django Engineer
description:
Apexive is a premier software studio that creates top-notch technology for startups.

We have a remote-first culture, and this position can be based anywhere. We encourage you to work in the way that best suits you. The company is led by a software architect (the founder actually codes), so you‚Äôll never feel like a cog in the machine. Everyone has the chance to make decisions that steer the company as a whole.

While we are technology agnostic and believe in using the right tools for a given challenge, we are experts in cutting-edge frameworks and platforms, such as Flutter/Dart, Google Cloud Platform/AWS/Kubernetes, Python/Django, and Terraform, to name very a few. This is a full-time position.

For this role, we are considering candidates who are remote-based. Apexive offers different work modes to meet the variety of needs and preferences of our team. Learn more about our engineering philosophies, tools, and some of the challenges we‚Äôve been solving on our Engineering blog.

What You‚Äôll Do:

- Develop and maintain Backend solutions using Python/Django
- Build docker images that can run on top of AWS or other PaaS
- Model databases using MySQL, Postgres, DynamoDB
- Understand the needs of our clients and come up with solutions for their problems
- Taking an active part in our learning and knowledge-sharing culture

Skills We‚Äôre looking for:

- 3+ years of Python/Django experience
- Experience with RESTful backend applications, specially built with Django
- An inability to write anything but clean, maintainable code.
- Strong aversion to hard code
- Experience with deployment processes like AWS, Heroku
- Being up-to-date with the latest news and technologies about the Backend
- High English proficiency as our company language is English
- Ability to work independently
- Alignment with our values, including get things done attitude

We‚Äôre looking for people who are passionate about building tech for startups and do not afraid of challenges!

Nice to have:

- UI/UX feeling
- Docker, CircleCI
- Terraform, Odoo
- Basic knowledge of frontend
- Contributions to open-source projects

Perks & Benefits

üí∞ Competitive compensation
üìà Equity options
üíª Work with the latest tech stack and top startups from various industries
üèñÔ∏è Offsite week in Thailand full of adventures ‚Äî all expenses paid
üß≥ Flexible work hours and truly remote work culture
üßó‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Work From Anywhere
üë´ Mentorship program ‚Äî get a mentor and become one
üìö Conferences, meetups, language lessons, and seminars to support personal growth

Our Hiring Process:

Joining Apexive means becoming part of a team that values innovation and collaboration. Here's how our hiring process works:

Apply: Start by submitting your application. Show us why you're excited about joining Apexive and how your skills and experiences make you a great fit for our team.

Technical Survey: After applying, you'll be asked to complete a technical survey. This is your opportunity to showcase your skills. Please include links to specific sections of code where you've made significant contributions or solved complex problems.

Cultural Fit Interview: If your technical survey impresses us, we'll invite you for a cultural fit interview. This is a chance for us to get to know each other better and see how well you align with Apexive's values and culture.

Technical Interview: Next, you'll have a technical interview. This is where you'll demonstrate your technical expertise, problem-solving abilities, and how you approach and tackle technical challenges.

Offer: If all goes well, we'll extend an offer for you to join our team!

Welcome aboard!

title: Python Developer Middle-Senior
description:
Company Overview:
We are a dynamic and innovative company at the forefront of cryptocurrency exchange development. Our mission is to provide users with a secure and user-friendly platform for trading digital assets. Join our talented team of professionals and contribute to shaping the future of the crypto industry.

Position: Python Developer (Middle/Senior)

Location: Cyprus or Remote

Responsibilities:
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and maintain the user interface.
Implement responsive and interactive user interfaces using React/Next.js libraries.
Work closely with UX/UI designers to ensure the best possible user experience.
Optimize application performance for maximum speed and scalability.
Collaborate with backend developers, frontend developers.
Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in frontend development and cryptocurrencies.

Requirements:
Competencies:
We are seeking individuals with expertise in the following areas:
Development of new components for our financial services
Improvement of existing services, ensuring high-quality code with test coverage
Selection and implementation of architectural patterns suitable for solving specific challenges

Implementation of APIs for both existing and new services
Technology Stack:

Django Rest Framework for API development
Celery for task management
PostgreSQL and Redis for data storage
Unix environment proficiency
Additional Preferred Skills:

Familiarity with other frameworks and programming languages
Experience with GraphQL

CI/CD, Docker, Gitlab

Experience with modern interface frameworks


Benefits:
Competitive salary.
Remote work options.
Opportunities for professional development and training.

We look forward to welcoming a talented Python Developer to our team!

title: Senior/Principal Python Developer (AdTech)
description:
We are looking for a Senior Python Developer to join the AdTech project that helps publishers control Ad traffic revenue. Together, we will use a unique approach to identify winning strategies quickly and scale them efficiently.

Bring your expertise to our dynamic and forward-thinking environment!

CUSTOMER
Our client provides a solution that helps publishers control Ad traffic revenue. During the first stage of development, the main platforms for the interaction will be Facebook Ads, OB Media, and Zemanta. Our main development goal is to build the system based on the ‚Äúcode-less‚Äù concept so the system will be self-supportive.

RESPONSIBILITIES
- Writing clean, efficient, and maintainable code in Python
- Implementing APIs and integrating external systems
- Designing, optimizing, and managing SQL database modules
- Performance improvement and code optimization
- Covering code with unit tests

REQUIREMENTS
- 6+ years of experience with Python (FAST API)
- Good knowledge of JavaScript (TypeScript, React)
- Experience with AWS
- Ability to work independently
- At least an Upper-Intermediate level of English
- Focus on simplicity and quality
- Excellent problem-solving skills
- Good communication skills

WOULD BE A PLUS:
- Experience in the AdTech domain
- Experience with‚ÄØFacebook Ads/Zemanta/Taboola

title: Senior Python Engineer
description:
Join Dicer.ai as a Senior Python Engineer - AI, Python, APIs, AWS, and More: Shaping the Future of AI-Powered Digital Marketing!

Dicer.ai, pioneering the world of digital marketing with AI-powered analytics, is looking for an experienced Senior Python Engineer to join our dynamic tech team. As we continue to optimize over $500M in ad spend, we need your technical expertise to scale our capabilities and innovation.

About This Role:

In this role, you will be instrumental in developing and maintaining our cutting-edge digital marketing platform. Your proficiency in AI, Python, API design, and cloud technologies will be crucial for our continued success and growth.

Required Skills:

- Python Programming: Apply your profound expertise in Python to develop robust and scalable code.
- API Design & Implementation: Design and implement robust APIs to integrate diverse systems and data sources.
- Docker/Containerization: Utilize your understanding of Docker and other containerization technologies to ensure consistent and efficient deployment.
- AWS Expertise: Manage and optimize our AWS infrastructure, ensuring high performance and reliability.
- PostgreSQL Proficiency: Leverage your skills in PostgreSQL or similar relational databases for efficient data management.
- Bazel Experience: Use Bazel for building and testing software, contributing to the overall efficiency of our development process.
- Excellent English communication skills, both written and verbal (the entire team is English speaking).
- Readiness to work in the New York Time Zone (GMT-5).

Desirable Skills:

- AI/ML Expertise: Experience in building and implementing large language models or other AI/ML models, with familiarity in tools like Langchain and OpenAI.
- Go Programming: Experience with Go language will be highly valued.
- Terraform Knowledge: Familiarity with infrastructure as code using Terraform is advantageous.
- Ad APIs Experience: Prior experience with advertising APIs like Facebook, Google, etc., will be beneficial.
- Data Lakes Insight: Knowledge of Data Lakes, especially Snowflake, is a plus.
- Distributed Systems: Proven experience in designing and working with distributed systems.

Why Dicer.ai?

title: Middle Python Developer
description:
LAB325, a pioneering software development company specializing in data solutions within the healthcare sector, is looking for an experienced Python Developer to join our team on a project basis.¬†

You, as our team member, will have an opportunity to join a socially significant Ukrainian program in the field of rehabilitation of injured people. As part of this project, we develop a web-based application that determines the position of a person‚Äôs joints using several cameras in space.¬†

Requirements:
- 3+ years of hands-on experience in Python development.

- Knowledge of TensorFlow or PyTorch frameworks.
- Familiarity with GitLab CI/CD and Docker.¬†
- Practical knowledge of API, GraphQL and Rest (tools and libraries).
- Level of proficiency in English - sufficient to read the technical documentation.

Will be a plus:
- Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs in Computer Science, Data Science, Mathematics.

- Knowledge of NumPy and SciPy libraries.
- Experience in design architecture of complex web applications/platforms.

What do we offer:

- Competitive compensation

title: Python Developer - LiDAR Data Processing
description:
Hi there!
GIS-Point is a Ukrainian outsourcing company based in Eastern Europe. We are building remote GIS teams in Ukraine for GIS companies and we are the best professionals dedicated to the projects of our customers.
We are seeking a skilled Python Developer with expertise in LiDAR data processing to join our team. The primary responsibility will be to develop a script/feature/micro-tool for vectorizing (outlining) road asphalt edges and markings in a 3D point cloud (LiDAR x, y, z).

Key Responsibilities:
- Develop Python script/feature/micro-tool to process LiDAR data and extract road asphalt edges and markings in a 3D point cloud environment.
- Utilize advanced algorithms for precise vectorization in LiDAR data processing.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate the developed tool into existing workflows.

Requirements:
- Proven experience as a Python Developer, with a focus on LiDAR data processing.
- In-depth understanding of LiDAR data and its applications, specifically in road infrastructure analysis.
- Strong proficiency in Python programming and relevant libraries (e.g., NumPy, Pandas).
- Familiarity with 3D point cloud processing techniques.
- Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Previous experience in developing tools for LiDAR-based road infrastructure analysis.
- Knowledge of industry-standard LiDAR software and tools.
- Familiarity with geospatial data formats and standards.

If you are passionate about LiDAR data processing, have a solid background in Python development, and are eager to contribute to cutting-edge road infrastructure analysis, we invite you to apply. Join us in shaping the future of 3D point cloud applications for road mapping and analysis.

title: Strong Middle C++/Python Developer IRC213453
description:
Description:

Our client is a leading world international company which provides a dynamic, automated printing solution allowing users to create and monitor label printing on large manufactures. Our team is working together with the client as a single unit extending the capabilities of a Common Platform, a microservice-based system which provides a set of services to control printers, including the HMI layer. The main product features include a customizable web browser interface for operators to design labels, manage and monitor printers individually or in groups, access printer dashboards, configure and manage automated printing applications dynamically.

Requirements:
- 5+ years of development experience as C++ or Python engineer (in total)
- Good knowledge in C++ (17), Python, CMake, Linux
- Knowledge in embedded SW development, embedded system integration will be a plus
- Google Test Framework/Google
- Mock/Docker/Playwright
- Bash scripting (dev env.)
- Yocto / Mosquitto / RabbitMQ / Zero
- MQ/socket (high speed comms)/Systemd
- Upper intermediate English (written and spoken)
- Ability to work in a fast moving and multicultural environment

Responsibilities:
- Development and integration of software changes
- Common Platform new features design and development
- Defects analysis and fixing
- Writing and performing system integration tests
- Other engineering support and maintenance activities for Common Platform software product
- Be able to work with physical HW

What We Offer

Empowering Projects: With 500+ clients spanning diverse industries and domains, we provide an exciting opportunity to contribute to groundbreaking projects that leverage cutting-edge technologies. As a team, we engineer digital products that positively impact people‚Äôs lives.

Empowering Growth: We foster a culture of continuous learning and professional development. Our dedication is to provide timely and comprehensive assistance for every consultant through our dedicated Learning & Development team, ensuring their continuous growth and success.

Career Development: Our corporate culture places a strong emphasis on career development, offering abundant opportunities for growth. Regular interactions with our teams ensure their engagement, motivation, and recognition. We empower our team members to pursue their career goals with confidence and enthusiasm.

Comprehensive Benefits: In addition to equitable compensation, we provide a comprehensive benefits package that prioritizes the overall well-being of our consultants. We genuinely care about their health and strive to create a positive work environment.

Flexible Opportunities: At GlobalLogic, we prioritize work-life balance by offering flexible opportunities tailored to your lifestyle. Explore relocation and rotation options for diverse cultural and professional experiences in different countries with our company.

About GlobalLogic

GlobalLogic is a leader in digital engineering. We help brands across the globe design and build innovative products, platforms, and digital experiences for the modern world.

By integrating experience design, complex engineering, and data expertise‚Äîwe help our clients imagine what‚Äôs possible, and accelerate their transition into tomorrow‚Äôs digital businesses.

Headquartered in Silicon Valley, GlobalLogic operates design studios and engineering centers around the world, extending our deep expertise to customers in the automotive, communications, financial services, healthcare and life sciences, manufacturing, media and entertainment, semiconductor, and technology industries.
